metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9066 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.7.5, there is insufficient redirect validation in the HTTP class, leading to SSRF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
